DOCNAME: CASE OF SHIROKIKH AND OTHERS v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 5 - Right to liberty and security (Article 5-3 - Length of pre-trial detention);Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Criminal proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time)
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The list of applicants and the relevant details of the applications are set out in the appended table .
CARDINAL . The applicants complained of the excessive length of their pre - trial detention . In application no . CARDINAL the applicant also raised a complaint under LAW .
